data.message: Facebook, I have it set so that only people who I have mutual friends with can send me messages. Unfortunately, there have been  times when I received message requests from people who I have no mutual requests with and they ended up being important but I wasn't able to see them because of the previous settings I set regarding messages. Is there a way for me to receive notifications when I do receive those message requests? Or do I have to make it so that everyone can directly send me messages?

replies.message: Hi Clark. You can send messages to anyone on Facebook, and, as you’ve seen, messages that you send to people you’re not connected to appear in their message requests. Learn how to check your message requests here: http://bit.ly/2e7VUXR. -Nick
Ah so I don't get notifications. I guess I'll have to check my requests more often. Thanks for the reply.
